job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Company OverviewOur founding team has extensive experience in building, researching, and selling machine learning products and came together in search of a product that could leverage these skills for positive impact. Now, weâve set out to build software that works to address the generation defining issue of economic inequality in the face of climate change.Â  We are running head first at the $150B+ coverage gap that faces the insurance industry as increasingly frequent and severe weather events challenge the status quo.The problems we wrestle with every day areâ¦ Re-thinking the first principles of state of the art predictive and optimization mechanismsDoing so in a multi-cloud infrastructure environment with significant security constraintsEnabling a lightweight, low-latency, and consumable UX despite the complexityÂ The team is looking for talented, driven, and, above all, caring individuals to join us in that journey.Â Â Â RequirementsDemonstrated interest in engineering for impact2+ years of hands-on industry experience in full stack / data engineeringEvent backbone and job pool platforms (Kafka, etc)Willingness to get hands dirty across a broad variety of internal and client software2+ years of experience with React, Python (Django + Flask) and Node.jsDemonstrated ability to pick up new technologies quickly and learn on the flyNice-To-HavesUndergraduate or Graduate work in a related fieldExperience with ML or optimization
